metadata.feature_description: View, sort, and manage the list of custom URLs

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Retrieve all custom URLs for a page

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and select 'Test Page One'
steps.actual: Page details panel opened showing page information

steps.action: Click Advanced tab, then S.E.O. sub-tab
steps.expected: URLs for this page section should be visible with list of URLs
steps.actual: URLs for this page section displayed with 5 URL entries including custom and automatic URLs

steps.action: Click on URL column header to sort alphabetically
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted alphabetically by path (ascending or descending)
steps.actual: Column headers are not clickable/sortable. No sort indicators or interactive behavior present. URLs remain in fixed display order.

issues: Column headers (URL, URL Type, Generated By) are not interactive and do not support sorting functionality

steps.action: Click on URL Type column header to sort by status code
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted by URL type (Active 200, Redirect 301)
steps.actual: Column header is not clickable. No sorting functionality available.

issues: URL Type column header does not support sorting

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct display of URL properties

steps.action: View URL list for Test Page One
steps.expected: Each URL should display: URL path, URL Type (status code), and Generated By information
steps.actual: All URL properties displayed correctly: URL path (/my-custom-url-edited, /Test-Page-One, /old-page-url, etc.), URL Type (Active 200, Redirect 301), Generated By (SuperUser Account for custom URLs, Automatic for system URLs)

steps.action: Verify custom URLs have edit/delete icons
steps.expected: Custom URLs should have edit and delete action icons
steps.actual: Custom URLs (created by SuperUser Account) show edit and delete icons, while automatic URLs do not have these actions

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with page having only automatic URL (minimal list)

steps.action: Select 'Bulk Test Page 1' and navigate to Advanced > S.E.O. tab
steps.expected: Page should show URL list with only automatic system-generated URL
steps.actual: URL list displays single entry: /Bulk-Test-Page-1 - Active (200) - Automatic

steps.expected: Add URL form should appear with required fields
steps.actual: Add URL form displayed with Site Alias dropdown, URL Path textbox, and URL Type dropdown

steps.action: Enter URL path and expand URL Type dropdown
steps.expected: URL Type dropdown should show available status codes
steps.actual: URL Type dropdown shows 'Active (200)' and 'Redirect (301)' options. Save button enabled after entering path.

steps.action: Click Cancel button to dismiss form
steps.actual: Form closed successfully, URL list unchanged

observations: Custom URLs are managed at the individual page level under Pages > [Page] > Advanced > S.E.O. tab, not through a centralized URL Management listing
The main SEO > URL Management section in Settings contains General Settings, Extension URL Providers, Expressions, and Test URL tabs - but no centralized custom URL listing
Sorting functionality as described in the feature requirements (sort by URL path, creation date, locale, status code) is NOT available in the UI - column headers are static and non-interactive
The UI distinguishes between custom URLs (created by users, with edit/delete icons) and automatic URLs (system-generated, no actions)
URL Type options available: Active (200) for primary URLs and Redirect (301) for redirects
Site Alias dropdown in Add URL form supports multi-locale configurations
